title: StuffIt Deluxe 2009 v.13.0 UB (engl.) RETAIL
description:
Product Description:
StuffIt Deluxe 2009 v.13.0 - comprehensive archiving tool
The ultimate in compression and archive management
Compress files by up to 98% of their original size. StuffIt&#039;s advanced MP3, PDF and Image compression enhancements that saves more space than ever before.
Compress and expand archives
Super-strong encryption security and password protection
Self-healing archive creation protects againt data corruption
Send and transfer via email or FTP
Complete data backup management
Integrated workflow features

Mac System Requirements

What&#039;s New in StuffIt 2009
